forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
